image.altText: Tasmanian federal electorates 2025 graphic.

image.altText: Colourful pencils on a desk in a childcare centre.

title.children: New salmon laws are about much more than Tasmania's salmon industry

image.altText: Concept art showing interior of sports stadium with cricket match underway.

props.synopsis: Cricket authorities have penned a bombshell letter to the Tasmanian government expressing reservations about the stadium's roof in its current design, saying the "stadium is unlikely to be conducive to hosting test matches" while requesting a return to the drawing board.

title.children: Macquarie Point stadium roof in doubt, as cricket raises 'significant concerns'

image.altText: A SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule manoeuvres in space following undocking from the ISS to begin a journey to return to Earth.

title.children: Astronauts to grow edible mushrooms during next space mission

image.altText: Aerial view of cracked light brown clay with a bright green soy plant growing out of a crack in the middle.

title.children: Stuart's family say he asked for help but didn't get it. Days later he was dead

image.altText: A graphic showing Anthony Albanese and Peter Dutton with bowser pumps, in front of a background of hundred dollar bills.

props.synopsis: A policy fight over cost-of-living relief has emerged with a federal election looming. Labor and the Coalition have both promised to ease hip pocket pain, but voters will be asked to choose between income tax cuts or cheaper petrol.Â

image.altText: Organised crime figure Alvin Chau

image.altText: An Aboriginal woman with grey hair is wearing red cat-eye glasses, a white t shirt and quandong seed necklace looks off camera.

image.altText: A map showing a storm system off the cost of WA.

title.children: 'Small piece in a really big jigsaw': Penguin frozen in time finds home

image.altText: Shark net in the northern beaches of Sydney.

image.altText: A whole, halved and sliced Shepard avocado, one variety commonly available in Australia.
